title: Which Dominates Industrial-Current-Density CO2-to-C2+ Electroreduction: CuÎ´+ or Microenvironment
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04147F, Paper
Ruoou Yang, Mao Wu, Danji Huang, Yan Yang, Yan Liu, Leiqian Zhang, Feili Lai, Bo You, Jiakun Fang, Tianxi Liu, Youwen Liu, Tianyou Zhai
The role and reconstitution of the architecture and oxidation state of Cu-based catalysts need to be fully understood during the industrial-current-density CO2 electroreduction (ICD-CO2R). Herein, by utilizing operando/ in situ...
